title: Spacious 3 bedroom | 2nd Floor Unit | Pool View
map_address: 549 S Park Victoria Dr near Yosemite
posting_body: 555 Apartments - Apply today at <URL>
We are surrounded by lush greenbelts, an abundance of amenities, and remodeled apartments.
555 is a wonderful place to call home!
We are a two story garden style apartment.
We offer various floor plans, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and private patio or balcony.
This apartment home is located on the 2nd floor and has carpeted floors throughout the bedrooms and and living area.

It comes with a gourmet style kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, 4 burner electric glass top stove, stackable washer/dryer, and wall unit heater/air-conditioning come standard in all of our apartment homes.
Ask about apartment 514.
This is a 13 month lease.
Amenities include a pool, gym, BBQ area, playground and beautiful greenbelt areas.
You are a short drive to shopping, restaurants and entertainment, fun is always accessible.
Let us introduce you to 555 living!
We are offering self-guided tours!
Leasing Office is closed to public.
Leasing Office Hours:
Monday- Friday: 8:30am-5:30pm
Saturday: 9 am-5pm
Sunday: CLOSED
Call us for more details or visit our website!
